changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE JOB_PARAMETER( JOB_PARAMETER_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL, JOB_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, VALUE VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, CREATED_BY CHAR(6) NOT NULL, CREATED_TS DATETIME NOT NULL, UPDATED_BY CHAR(6), UPDATED_TS DATETIME ) ALTER TABLE JOB_PARAMETER ADD CONSTRAINT JOB_PARAMETER_PK PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED(JOB_PARAMETER_ID) ALTER TABLE JOB_PARAMETER ADD CONSTRAINT JOB_PARAMETER_DF_JOB_PARAMETER_ID DEFAULT NEWID() FOR JOB_PARAMETER_ID ALTER TABLE JOB_PARAMETER ADD CONSTRAINT JOB_PARAMETER_FK_JOB_ID FOREIGN KEY(JOB_ID) REFERENCES JOB(JOB_ID) GO
INSERT INTO JOB_PARAMETER(JOB_ID, NAME, VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS) SELECT J.JOB_ID, 'OFFICIAL_DATE', CONVERT(VARCHAR, J.OFFICIAL_DT, 101), 'LRSSYS', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM JOB J WHERE J.OFFICIAL_DT IS NOT NULL
INSERT INTO JOB_PARAMETER(JOB_ID, NAME, VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS) SELECT J.JOB_ID, 'START_DATE', CONVERT(VARCHAR, J.START_DT, 101), 'LRSSYS', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM JOB J WHERE J.OFFICIAL_DT IS NOT NULL
INSERT INTO JOB_PARAMETER(JOB_ID, NAME, VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS) SELECT J.JOB_ID, 'END_DATE', CONVERT(VARCHAR, J.END_DT, 101), 'LRSSYS', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM JOB J WHERE J.OFFICIAL_DT IS NOT NULL GO
ALTER TABLE JOB DROP COLUMN OFFICIAL_DT ALTER TABLE JOB DROP COLUMN START_DT ALTER TABLE JOB DROP COLUMN END_DT
